front.title: IEEE Draft Standard Definitions for the Measurement of Electric Power Quantities Under Sinusoidal, Balanced, or Unbalanced Conditions

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This is a standard for definitions used for measurement of electric power quantities under sinusoidal, balanced, or unbalanced conditions. It lists the mathematical expressions that were used in the past, as well as new expressions, and explains the features of the new definitions
